author: Staff Reporter
text:
In an 18-year-old Arms Act violation case, actor Salman Khan on Thursday pleaded “not guilty” in a Jodhpur court.

In his statement at the Jodhpur chief judicial magistrate's court, the actor said that he was being “falsely implicated” in the case in which he has been accused of using weapons with expired licence for alleged blackbuck hunting, Mr. Khan’s counsel H.M. Saraswat told The Hindu adding that the actor was innocent.

The next hearing in the case would be held on April 4.
title: Salman Khan pleads ‘not guilty’ in blackbuck case
